ethumange awasan horawe dadise ethuman rogathurawu wita, ma ema parichchedayan parayanaya kara saubhagya labiya yuthuyi yana apekshawen ethumange deathhi pimbaa ethumange sirurehi pirimaddemi.” (mulashrayanh buhari 4629, muslim 4066). 5- withr salathayehi: nabi (ﷺ) thuman withr salathayehi prathama rakathayehi sabbihisma parichchedayath, dewani rakathayehi kul ya ayiyuhal kafirun parichchedayath thewani rakathayehi al ihlas parichchedayath parayanaya karanneya” yanuwen aayisha (rali) thumiya warthakarayi.

karunanidhige pakshaya balayata pathwenawita thamilnaduwe dala deshiya nishpadithaye wardhanaya 21% wunu athara 2010/11 wasara waladi eya 11.76% dakwa kadawati thibenawa. 2007/08 wasaredi indiyanu rupiyal koti 4,545ka ayawaya wasiyak thibunu thamilnaduwata 2010/11 wasaredi indiyanu rupiyal koti 3129k ayawaya hingayak athiwi thibenawa.

shri lanka guwan hamudawe china waraya kadawuren guwan gatha kerunu niyamuwange mulika puhunuwa sandaha bhawitha karana sesna 150 guwan yanayak thakshanika doshayak hethuwen thrikunamalaye nilaweli werala aasannaye pihiti irakkandi pradeshayata hadisi godabamak sidu kara thibenawa.mema hadissi goda bama ada udasana 10.48ta pamana sidu kala bawayi guwan hamuda madhya prakashaka bala ghana nayaka dushan wijesinha pawasanne.kese wethath mema hadisi goda bama hethuwen guwan niyamuwan dedenata anathurak sidu wi nomathi athara owunge dakshathawa hethuwen sidu wimata anathurak walakwa ganimata haki wu bawayi madhya prakashaka waraya pawasanne.mita sulu welawakata pera ema guwan yanaye athi wu karmika doshaya aluth wadiya kota nawatha guwan gatha kara bawa guwan hamudawa sandahan kala.
